item.title: Bandwidth API
item.description: Messaging 101 About Bandwidth It is a CPaaS provider - this is short for Communications Platforms as a Service - and it is the only CPaaS provider with its own national CLEC?? network Billions of messages every month and 52m numbers on their network What is a text message? Itâ€™s not any of those received from WhatsApp, GroupMe, or Messenger, or any other app like that.
